meanings.definition: A brown pigment obtained from the ink sac of a cuttlefish.
meanings.sent1: The artist used sepias to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The sepias in the ink gave the drawing a warm tone.
meanings.sent3: The sepias spilled on the paper, creating a messy but interesting pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sepias in her artwork was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sepias added a touch of elegance to the portrait.

meanings.sent1: The old book had faded to sepias over time.
meanings.sent2: The sepias of the autumn leaves painted a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent3: The sepias of the chocolate cake made it look rich and delicious.
meanings.sent4: The sepias of the forest at dusk were like a blanket of shadows.
meanings.sent5: The sepias of the antique furniture gave the room a cozy feel.

meanings.definition: A photograph or print in sepia tones.
meanings.sent1: She loved taking sepias of old buildings in the city.
meanings.sent2: The sepias of the family portrait captured a moment frozen in time.
meanings.sent3: The sepias of the beach looked like a scene from a vintage postcard.
meanings.sent4: The sepias of the wedding album told a story of love and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sepias of the landscape photo gave it a nostalgic feel.
